Body.Content:
As mentioned in MC708335, beginning in April 2024, Intune audit logs will only be retained for up to one year to align with the documented retention period.

How this will affect your organization:

If you would like to retain audit logs older than one year, export the logs before this change by navigating to the Intune admin center > Tenant administration > Audit logs, use the Filter option to select a date range and then select Export. For more details, read Use audit logs to track and monitor events in Microsoft Intune.

What you need to do to prepare:

Notify your IT admins and update your documentation guidelines as needed.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Intune audit logs will only be retained for one year starting April 2024. Users can export logs older than one year before the change in the Intune admin center. Notify IT admins and update documentation guidelines.

Title: Plan for Change: Intune audit logs will only be retained for one year
